I just read about Kenneth Stanley's NERO and rtNEAT, which is both
infuriat=
ing and exciting at the same time.
I was trying to establish an efficient m=
ethod of crossing over a
recurrent NN, when I found information on NEAT.
So=
 on the one hand, I'm overjoyed to find the answers, I was hoping to
figure=
 it out for myself :/

Great work, Kenneth, particularly the matching of ch=
romosomes for
crossover (historical numbers, etc) and the speciation ;)

I'=
m reluctant to give details of the game I'm planning, but it will be
